attributes.action: demand the chairman of the major banks of this country be held accountable for the actions in de-stabilising this country powered by there own greed in profit making.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To everyone in this country who have lost ther jobs recently or who's families have been affected by this credit crunch.I think it is only fair that if these bankers who are supposed to be highly qualified and ready for the postions that they have taken on, be accountable for there actions. Not only should they be removed from there positions but there positions be scrutinised and goverened by a seperate body and monitored by an independent body of people made up of british citizens with half of the body being made up of the general public i.e shop floor workers ect. Gordon Brown do something now.
